#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

const int N = 10000000;
bool isPrime[N+1];
int count1[N+1];

void sieve() {
    
    
    
    memset(isPrime,1,sizeof(isPrime));
    isPrime[0] = false;
    isPrime[1] = false;
    //cout<<"Hello"<<endl;
    for(int i = 2; i * i <= N; ++i) {
         if(isPrime[i] == true) {
             // Mark all the multiples of i as composite numbers
             for(int j = i * i; j <= N ;j += i)
                 isPrime[j] = false;
        }
    }
    int curr = 0;
    for(int i=2;i<N;i++)
    {
       if(isPrime[i])
         curr++;
       count1[i]=curr;
    }

}
int main()
{

   sieve();
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
	   int n;
           scanf("%d",&n);
           int val = count1[n]-count1[n/2];
           printf("%d\n",val);
   }
}
